conversion_verification.notes: The second image is a 3D-styled top-down render, but the camera is essentially orthographic/straight-down with no meaningful oblique angle; vertical wall faces and interior volume are not perceptible as true 3D space.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection due to pure top-down orthographic view (no angled/isometric perspective), preventing a verifiable 3D spatial transformation.

detected_errors.description: Pure top-down/orthographic presentation; lacks an angled view needed to confirm true 3D conversion with visible multiple wall surfaces and interior volume.

summary: Rejected because the output is essentially a top-down 3D floor-plan render rather than an angled/isometric cutaway that demonstrates true 3D spatial volume.
